sentences.en: ...the effects of air pollutants on the biochemistry of plants or animals.
sentences.cn: …大气污染物对植物或动物生化过程的影响。

sentences.en: At present, the dry type biochemistry analyzer was also more widespread application.
sentences.cn: 目前, 干化学式生化分析仪也已得到较为广泛的应用.

sentences.en: Biochemistry experiment plays a key role in the studies of this course.
sentences.cn: 生物化学实验是学好本课程的关键环节.

sentences.en: Botany, zoology, biochemistry and molecular biology, cell biology, microbiology, genetics, fermentation engineering.
sentences.cn: 植物学, 动物学, 生物化学与分子生物学, 细胞生物学, 微生物学, 遗传学, 发酵工程.

sentences.en: Cambridge University Biochemistry Building was a three storeyed red - brick neo - Renaissance structure , plain and unimpressive.
sentences.cn: 剑桥大学的生物化学馆,是一座三层红砖楼房,新文艺复兴时期式样,朴实无华,也不显眼.

sentences.en: I plan to take biochemistry this semester.
sentences.cn: 这学期我准备选修生物化学.

sentences.en: It is combined with nano - technique, light - purge technique, catalyzation, pharmaceutics and biochemistry.
sentences.cn: 它是融 纳米 技术 、 光技术净化、触酶(催化) 、 药学技术、生物化学为一体的新技术 、 新方法.

sentences.en: Objective: Establish the normal physiology index , haematology index and biochemistry index.
sentences.cn: 目的: 建立清洁级SD大鼠的正常生理、生化指标.

sentences.en: Purpose : To establish a clinical biochemistry databank manage system.
sentences.cn: 目的: 建立一种临床生化检验数据库管理系统.

sentences.en: She studies biochemistry, or the science of life.
sentences.cn: 她学生物化学, 也就是生命科学.

sentences.en: The calorie is the unit usually used for measuring the amount of energy transfer in biochemistry.
sentences.cn: 生物化学中测定能量转移量的单位是大卡.

sentences.en: The scientist's theory has filled in a gap in biochemistry.
sentences.cn: 那位科学家的理论填补了生物化学中的一项空白.

sentences.en: There are two main types of uses of radioactive isotopes in biochemistry.
sentences.cn: 在生物化学中,放射性同位素主要有两方面的应用.

sentences.en: Without biochemistry, people would not know of their existence.
sentences.cn: 如果不是生物化学, 人们还不会知道它们的纯在.

sentences.en: You are propagandising by attempting to mix evolutionism with biochemistry.
sentences.cn: 你把进化论和生物化学搞混了.
